definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然後添加到一碗熱氣騰騰的水和吸入五分鐘。

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和麪粉的時候會發生什麼事呢？

sentences.english: The pulse discharge phenomena of gas-liquid mixture in wire-wire gap are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氣液混合兩相體中線線電極脈衝放電現象。

sentences.english: Combine four cubes and 8 oz. of Diet Coke.
sentences.chinese: 混合四個冰塊和220ml健怡可樂。

sentences.english: Specify a constraining rule on the text in an element with mixed content.
sentences.chinese: 在具有混合內容的元素的文本中指定一個約束規則。

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 簡單的混合原料，加冰塊，攪合，享用。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 採用懸浮交聯法制備沙棘混合粉的微膠囊。

sentences.english: The pro rowers from Bristol usually row in a mixed four team.
sentences.chinese: 來自親賽艇運動員布里斯托爾通常排在混合四隊。

sentences.english: Instead, by mixing primary colors, all other colors can be generated.
sentences.chinese: 相反，通過混合三原色，可以生成其他所有的顏色。

sentences.english: Complementary colors make white lights when two are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 當兩種顏色混合時，互補色合成白光。

sentences.english: A digital-analog PLL is the main part of the data separator.
sentences.chinese: 這個數據分離器的主要部分是一個數模混合的鎖相環。

sentences.english: The mixed pendulum is a new one which consists of a simple pendulum and a compound pendulum.
sentences.chinese: 混合擺是由單擺與復擺構成的一種新型擺。

sentences.english: His headquarters are somewhere in the Everglades, his gang are a mixed-up bunch.
sentences.chinese: 其總部設在某處沼澤地，他的團伙是一個混合了一堆。

sentences.english: The ratio of foam concentrate is accurate because of the balance valve's dynamic adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 壓力平衡閥的動態調節保證了較爲精確的混合比。
爲什麼創建混合式集羣？

sentences.english: Combine glaze ingredients; drizzle over cake.
sentences.chinese: 混合澆汁材料，淋在蛋糕上。

definition: mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
